In way , role nutrition evolve hunger satisfaction maintenance body integrity promotion state well-being prevention important chronic disease cancer , diabetes cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) . In recent year , n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFA ) attract much attention consumption n-3 PUFA rich diet report reduce CVD risk . However , n-3 PUFA also highly susceptible free radical damage therefore could unable fully exert health benefit oxidative stress condition . The general objective present application investigate mechanisms n-3 PUFA improve cardiovascular health abdominal obesity explore potential dietary antioxidant modulate effect individual high risk oxidative stress . DOC.criteria: Waist circumference > 90 cm Fasting triglycerides > 1.7 mmol/L No use ( ever ) medication treatment dyslipidemia hypertension Alcohol consumption > 1 drink per day i.e ~15 g alcohol/day equivalent 1 beer ( 12 oz 341 mL ) , 1 glass wine ( 4 oz 125 mL ) 1 ounce ( 30 mL ) liquor . Chronic use supplement ( vitamin , mineral flavonoid ) Body mass index > 35 kg/m2 Chronic disease : CHD , diabetes , etc .
